Dialogue.Page: Mod: The Hearthian Parable Authors: Vambok
The Hearthian Parable is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. It was a small mod thrown together in the last three days of the jam.
While Vambok's team decided to quit the jam, Vambok decided to make something out of what was left. Now, it's a fully voice acted experience with lots of funny moments and five endings.
